attributes.action: end expenses corruption by dissolving UK Parliament and devolving government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs have been enriching themselves, and forgotten duty to good office, and prudent use of our taxes, during difficult economic times. The gravy train is de-railed.

MPs have been inflating or claiming unreasonable expenses. Generous rules for themselves, denied taxpayers. Reciprocal favour behind closed doors.

Flipping Second Homes is deplorable.

In difficult economic times, MPs are having it easy.  Accountability can only come from newly elected or already elected different MPs.

We need an English General Election now to match other ready national Parliaments.

Treaty is inheritable, nations will still be within Europe, and citizens can relocate and work.

We the people, in sovereign Magna Carta authority, demand dissolution from UK Parliament; to be replaced by separately Elected Parliaments locally accountable to each nation.  

Full devolution resolves the national debt.

The UK may already be void ab initio, by means of current Breach of Magna.
We are all equal under our nation's own laws.

Devolution voids bail-out of greedy Scottish Banks RBS and HBOS; who also neglected duty for overseas self-enrichment.
attributes.creator_name: Neil P, (acting) Lord Protector of England

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
